title: विकीपीडिया से नाम उठाकर गलवान में मारे गए कथित 56 चीनी सैनिकों की लिस्ट बनाकर शेयर की गयी
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Finally, the names came forward. Our respectful homage to all those killed in action in Galwan valley yesterday while carrying out their duties with full of commitment to safe guard the Mother land. #IndiaChinaFaceOffpic.twitter.com/Rdb2abfaFS
